issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I have a login page that returns a redirect URL in the form of myschema://.
Webview is not able to handle the URL schema in iOS and rise an error.
I thought to prevent this by intercepting the request before it is loaded using the 'beforeload' event, but I discovered the event is not fired in case of redirection.
I would expect to be able to.
fields.summary: "beforeload" event is not fired on redirect
fields.environment:
Application type: mobile
SDK: 3.5.1.GA
Platform: iOS 8.2
Device: Simulator and physical device
Titanium Studio: 3.4.1.201410281727

comments.body:
Hi,

Please provide the test case to reproduce your problem, Here is the guide about [how to create a test case|http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/How_to_Submit_a_Bug_Report-section-29004732_HowtoSubmitaBugReport-CreatingaTestCase].
